message: Thank you for your service I was worried about a scam but after receiving letters from three companies thought I would risk it Your company were the cheapest and made it so easy for me e.g. I dint think I had anything that had my previous address on but you were willing to help me work through this Fortunately we didnt have to pursue this area Everything went quickly and smoothly Thank you I would recommend this company to anyone
